Posts.EditableText:
Hi again. Im having problems with the script switch. I made a command where if you type "choose" and then a symbol it'll change the player attribute symbol to whatever you typed (shown below). 
[attachment=0:35mpi5xi]<!-- ia0 -->switchscript.jpg<!-- ia0 -->[/attachment:35mpi5xi]
If I played the game and typed "choose music note" nothing would happen.
Posts.HTML:
Hi again. Im having problems with the script switch. I made a command where if you type "choose" and then a symbol it'll change the player attribute symbol to whatever you typed (shown below).

If I played the game and typed "choose music note" nothing would happen.

Posts.EditableText: Just pass [b:niiv2aq4]text [/b:niiv2aq4]to the switch statement, not [b:niiv2aq4]#text#[/b:niiv2aq4]. The [b:niiv2aq4]'#text#[/b:niiv2aq4]' form is only used in the pattern itself, not in the code.
Posts.HTML: Just pass text to the switch statement, not #text#. The '#text#' form is only used in the pattern itself, not in the code.
